title: Download play problem

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
It takes 2 days when i close then back it starts from beginning
http://imgur.com/a/hINFw
plz answer me

replies.body: It looks like your network might be having a block or some other issue reaching client services, like the patching server or pvp.net.  Run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this for a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!

may be the problem as i  use windows 10 ?!
or for something else ??
